website_summaries.verdict: This uniquely-designed faucet  functions even better than it looks.
pros: While customers love this faucet's unique aesthetic, they appreciate the functional upgrade it provides as well
Some customers even suggest this faucet can help reduce water bills
Designed to adapt to most plumbing configurations
cons: We love the look and function of this product and if it would last longer it would be nearly perfect

customer_reviews.title: This is a BAIT and SWITCH and NOT the faucet that is pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is a BAIT and SWITCH and NOT the faucet that is pictured. The faucet that came was a basic style with a pull up diverter, it appeared to have been returned or refurbished as well. I needed a down spout bad so I installed it and the diverter doesn't hold back all of the water but works well enough. I'll keep it but I will ALSO warn people that this posting is BS. This vendor will send you returns that are not even the same down spout pictured. If the vendor wants to make this right, send me the down spout pictured at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Giskard

customer_reviews.title: But for less that $20 I picked up this nice piece, which is well made and quite attractive ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different tricks to stop the old one from leaking but the water pressure in my house is 60 psi so, once the seals failed, there was no fixing it. But for less that $20 I picked up this nice piece, which is well made and quite attractive compared to the standard rectangular one that was already installed. It is a slip-on type connection and it fit perfectly without any issues or leaks at all. Works perfectly and the price was hard to beat. .
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality spout. Tried the cheaper spouts to replace our spout with diverter, which didn't last. This Kohler Spout is heavier and feels solid. Much easier to install too. The down flow on the spout is smooth and the diverter works well. (This is actually the replacement spout. The first spout that came leaked a little when using the diverter. Amazon promptly sent us a replacement.)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Bath Spout
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. It is a slide over pipe and screw pin install. You will need to measure your pipe coming out and cut to fit. The diverter lifts and drops easy but sometimes gets stuck on the way down when it rotates. Not sure why it freely rotates around but once activated no water comes through and all is diverted to shower head. It looks nice and pictures are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: KOHLER Forte Sculpted Spout Diverter.
customer_reviews.text: My old diverted spout was part of a Kohler Forte valve kit installed 6 years ago, the plastic diverter stopper and housing failed due to deposit buildup from well water, I was able to remove and clean it out once but the second time around it was done, this new diverter is exactly what came with original kit and took me about five minutes to install hopefully I'm going to get six years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: real metal
customer_reviews.text: Tired of the plastic junk that is in most of the lower to mid range priced faucets and drains, etc. Plastic can look nice but not durable. I would rather pay a little more and have metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: H T

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, works better than the original... diverter was obviously updated seeing as how it looks completely different than the one I had (which NEVER worked the way it was supposed to). There's still a little water coming out of the faucet when you engage the shower, but only a drip as opposed to the stream I had with the original model.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Mama

customer_reviews.title: Works but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated it leaks through spigot when using diverter to shower head. This causes an irritating noise when the leaking water strikes the drain strainer in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Pressure fitting failed miserably.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure fitting leaked. Management (wife) objected to the rain in the basement. After I removed the plastic compression fitting and replaced it with threaded copper the rain stopped. Although I found the correct extension from the wall to be 1/4 inch shorter than the extension indicated in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brown

customer_reviews.title: No more leaking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two spout to replace original 10-year old spouts. Previous problem of water coming from spouts when it was supposed to be diverted to shower head is resolved. No more leaking water from the spout when showering. Quick, easy installation with hex wrench.
customer_reviews.author: T. Agave

customer_reviews.title: It does not completely divert water. It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Spout does not completely divert water to shower. It leaks constantly, wasting water. Look else where for tub spout.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Crappy construction. Broke after being used 5 times
customer_reviews.text: Only used the shower 5 times and the lever broke. Inside piece replaced. Worked 2 times and piece broke again. Cheap crap. I’ve had one plumber visit and now will need another one. I am contacting Koehler to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks nice. The big win is that the pull to divert the water flow to the above shower head automatically released when you turn off the water. So no more turning on the water and saddening the shower spray you from up top.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet131

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive but could be more snug at the pipe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spout. For some reason it doesn't fit as snug as my old spout but seems to hold in place after good tightening and caulking around the perimeter to the wall. The water stream from the spout itself is better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: good design. good finish. although still have some minor leaking but compare to what I can find from box-chain home improvement store, i just cannot complain it, kohler design dose have its strength. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LoDaPal

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Slip-in install. Replacement for spout with a seized shower pull. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Diverter Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Diverter leaks. Not happy, I thought Kohler a good brand? Returning...
customer_reviews.author: H. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for a year now and it has worked for us just fine. My husband installed it and he used to be a plumber so he has some experience. We have not had any leakage and it matched up well with what it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bushey

customer_reviews.title: Works On My Shorter Pipe
customer_reviews.text: Installed earlier today. It fit my 1-5/8" long copper pipe with no problem. I didn't use the included chrome collar to make it fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect item or description
customer_reviews.text: The box says it is the 10281-4-G and the description says that it is a slip-fit, but that is not what was in the box. I received the screw on type.
customer_reviews.author: Simon I. Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Love the smooth edges
customer_reviews.text: Love the smooth edges. I have always purchased Kohler products. This one is just as good as any other that we have had. Quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.  leaks
customer_reviews.text: had a professional plumber install b/c it kept leaking. it still leaks. poor quality. plumber said it wont handle the psi.
customer_reviews.author: Nova cable cutter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. needed for repairs on tub
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. needed for repairs on tub, glad to find it on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pentecost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install without any problem. Look luxury on my bath tub. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great -- just like the original spout.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great -- just like the original spout.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Novak

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks even better
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Bath Spout from Kohler, the Bold Look company. I purchased it from Amazon.com and replaced my 27 year-old bath fitting. It has no leak anywhere and works great, on top of making my bathroom looking elegent. BTW, I'm not a plumber, nor handyman. But I replaced it without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Q. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Went right on with no hassles. Very easy to install. Worth the money. Matched my other fixtures perfectly! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to upgrade/replace old 80's era spout that made horrible squealing sounds when the shower was activated. This really increases the appearence of the tub, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HFL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Miles better than any of these sold in THD or LOWES.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeandtheland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Item works as described it fill the tub and operates the shower function as it should.
customer_reviews.author: John Doyle

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: works excellently. Always had a problem with the diverter getting stuck and lodged in one direction. No such problem with this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: T J McGahan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid metal, a great product. Very easy to install and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: gramaSu

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but it is dripping quite a lot when ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice ,but it is dripping quite a lot when turning a shower on,would not buy it again,since we might have to change it due the dripping.
customer_reviews.author: miroslav kazimir

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub Filler
customer_reviews.text: Very nice elegant look and the brushed nickel matches well with my other Kohler fixtures. The water flows out smoothly and doesn't just "splatter" out into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Okonkwo

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Slip on
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious improvement over the broken spout that came with my track home. Easy installation. Slip on!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and color
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and color. This is a replacement for the same one bought over 6 years ago. Our hard water did a number on our current one, so we decided to replace it. Never gave us any problems. Would recommend and order again.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Doodler

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace builders-grade Moen tub spout. This universal slip on spout was super-easy to install and has a VERY expensive appearance! Amazing how a tub spout can completely transform the tub area!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bielanski

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than the original spout that came with the original faucet. It seems the diverter in this unit was redesigned to better redirect water to the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: MIkeM

customer_reviews.title: The instruction is easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: The instruction is easy to understand. Even a girl like me can install it easily. And the product looks nice and high quality for all my client. Definitely will consider Kohler for my future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S Coldwell

customer_reviews.title: Poor effort, Kohler.
customer_reviews.text: According to Kohler customer support, this item is within specifications if it prevents 90% of the water from coming out the spout then the diverter is activated. Seems unacceptable to me. What if a car manufacturer viewed 10% of its vehicles with faulty brakes as acceptable? If I wasn't looking for a perfect match, this item would be on its way back. Poor effort, Kohler.
customer_reviews.author: Signor Emanuel Ravelli

customer_reviews.title: bath spout works great
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a spout with the exact same model. It was very easy to install and works great. Be sure to investigate the pipe length coming from the wall to buy the proper model.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price with a refined look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product looks much more expensive then it was. Great point it does not splash water like the three other brands I purchased prior to this Kohler. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SPRTWARIOR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not like style of installation but made it work
customer_reviews.author: L.E.N

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-10281-4-CP Forte Sculpted Diverter Bath Spout, Polished Chrome
product_meta.description:
Color:Polished ChromeFROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Forte wall-mount, slip-fit bath spout boasts two key strengths: versatile design and effortless installation, to complement bath and shower faucets in classic or contemporary spaces. It also features comes in a variety of durable KOHLER finishes. Coordinates well with Leighton fixtures.
feature_bullets: Premium material construction for durability and reliability
KOHLER finishes resist corrosion and tarnishing, exceeding industry durability
Coordinates with the Forté collection of faucets and accessories
Available in a variety of finishes to complement any decor
For bath and shower faucets with sculpted lever handle and slip-fit spout.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
